name: Amonkhet Dragon Wyrmling
speed: walk 30 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 60 ft.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
text: The dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
